    • getTrailingColorAndFormatProperties

      public static TellrawUtils.RawTextComponent getTrailingColorAndFormatProperties(String str)
      Creates a RawTextComponent with the same color and format properties as seen at the trailing end of the input String
      Parameters:
      str - The String from which to draw color/format properties by means of ChatColor.getLastColors(str)
      Returns:
      an empty text RawTextComponent with color and format properties defined
